author: tfischer
msg: last code change was not optimal; no need to use the Torque class for checking whether Torque is initialized

author: tfischer
msg: Check whether Torque is initialized before retrieving a connection
Torque does not throw an obvious error message if it is not initialized and the db is accessed.
This check should take care of that
See also issue TRQS288 in scarab

author: tfischer
msg: TorqueDataSourceFactory is not supported any more; changed to SharedPoolDataSourceFactory
